entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the main character in this passage, and he is being given a potion by Snape. He is described as having his eyelids flutter and open after the potion takes effect.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is giving Dumbledore a potion and questioning him about Marvolo Gaunt's ring.

entities.name: marvolo gaunt
entities.description: Marvolo Gaunt's ring is mentioned as being on the desk before Dumbledore.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: The sword of Gryï¬ƒndor is mentioned as lying beside Marvolo Gaunt's ring.

entities.name: ring
entities.description: Marvolo Gaunt's ring is a cursed object that Dumbledore touched.

relationships.description: Snape gives Dumbledore a potion to make him recover from the effects of touching Marvolo Gaunt's ring.
Dumbledore touches Marvolo Gaunt's ring, which carries a curse.
Snape questions Dumbledore about why he touched Marvolo Gaunt's ring.
